name: Dal Skuggor
description:
Dal Skuggor is a 2D Platformer designed for PC where the player plays
as a ghost.
The character has fallen into the ethereal realm and is affected by amnesia.
In order to pass on into the next life, he must regain his memories by
collecting fragments in each level which explain different segments of his
life and unlocks the exit after collecting all fragments.
The player must avoid the shadows as he will fade to darkness and be lost
forever, eternally damned to wonder the plains of the ethereal realm between
life and death.

Creators:
Derek Cormier - Programmer

Terri Brown - Programmer/Project Manager

Lewis Cooper - Artist

Ryan King - Artist
